text: Firaon ney kaha kay meri ijazat say pehlay tum iss per eman ley aaye? Yaqeenan yehi tumhara woh bara (sardar) hai jiss ney tum sab ko jadoo sikhaya hai so tumhen abhi abhi maloom ho jaye ga qasam hai mein abhi tumharay haath paon ultay tor per kaat doon ga aur tum sab ko sooli per latka doon ga
